title: SynXis Central Reservations
extract: SynXis Central Reservations (CR) is the most robust, flexible, easy-to-use rate and inventory management SaaS application. These tools enable hoteliers to support a multitude of rate, inventory and distribution strategies to achieve their business goals.
extract_html: SynXis Central Reservations (CR) is the most robust, flexible, easy-to-use rate and inventory management SaaS application. These tools enable hoteliers to support a multitude of rate, inventory and distribution strategies to achieve their business goals.
